shortdesc.ph: Stops pushing media streams to the specified CDN address.
Stops pushing media streams to the specified CDN URL.

section.p: Agora recommends using a more comprehensive server-side streaming feature. See [Implement Server-Side Streaming](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/media-push/restful/landing-page). You can call this method to stop live streaming to the specified CDN address. This method can only stop one address at a time. To stop multiple addresses, call this method multiple times.

Agora recommends using a more complete server-side streaming solution. See [Implement server-side live streaming](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/media-push/restful/landing-page). You can call this method to stop pushing media streams to a specified CDN URL. This method can only stop streaming to one URL at a time. To stop multiple streams, call this method multiple times.

section.title: Related Callbacks
section.p: After successfully calling this method, the SDK triggers the callback to report the streaming status.

plentry.pd: The media streaming URL, in RTMP or RTMPS format. The character length must not exceed 1024 bytes. Special characters such as Chinese are not supported.
The streaming URL in RTMP or RTMPS format. The length must not exceed 1024 bytes. Chinese or other special characters are not supported.
